about_the_game:
"Crazy Screw Removal" is a fun and challenging puzzle game where players can experience the strategic fun behind simple operations. At the start of each level, you'll see 5 screw slots and 2 boxes of different colors. Your task is to unscrew the screws that match the color of the boxes and let them automatically pop into the corresponding boxes. When a box is filled with 3 screws of the same color, it will be removed, and a new box will be randomly generated, along with a reward of 3 wrenches.

However, things are not always that simple. If the screws you unscrew do not match the boxes, they will temporarily occupy the slots. If all the slots are filled and no further actions can be taken, the game will end. Therefore, you need to plan the order of disassembly carefully to avoid blocking the slots with screws.

The game also offers various items to help you tackle difficult levels. For example, you can add extra screw slots and boxes, randomly change screw colors, or use the screw recycling tool to redistribute unmatched screws, ensuring a smooth disassembly process.

As the game progresses, you'll face more complex screw disassembly tasks. Each time you successfully complete a level, you'll feel a great sense of achievement and have the opportunity to unlock beautiful CG images, which you can appreciate anytime in the gallery.

"Crazy Screw Removal" is not only a game that tests your reaction speed but also a great companion that challenges your strategic thinking.
